messages.subject: Thanks
messages.msgSnippet: Jim - Thanks!! Maybe now we can actually discuss swords, tsuba and the like without all the other BS. Really appreciate your starting the group. Rich ...
messages.messageBody:
Jim -

Thanks!! Maybe now we can actually discuss swords, tsuba
and the like without all the other BS. Really appreciate
your starting the group.

Rich
